title: Adema (2001) Adema
description:
Adema is the debut album by Adema. After its release in 2001, it has sold over 600,000 copies, peaking at number 27 on the Billboard 200. Adema eventually become certified Gold in the US and sold over 1 million worldwide. The major singles from this album were "The Way You Like It" and "Giving In". "Freaking Out" has also seen some radio airplay. This remains their best-selling album to this day.
